text: bhumiyil avar ahankariccu natakkukayum, dusicca tantram kaikkeallukayum ceyyunnatinalan atâ€Œ. dusicca tantram (atinre phalam) at prayeagiccavaril tanneyan vannubhavikkuka. appeal purvvikanmarute karyattil untaya natapatikramamallate entanavar kattirikkunnatâ€Œ? allahuvinre natapatikramattin yatearu bhedagatiyum ni kantettukayilla. allahuvinre natapatikramattin yatearu marravum ni kantettukayilla
